item.title: So basically, kalke ami just ekta mic and camera niye dhuke jete parbo and start...
item.description:
So basically, kalke ami just ekta mic and camera niye dhuke jete parbo and start calling my self a shangbadik? Khota mari nai. Its a genuine question. Im curious to understand what just happened here. Jodi tai e hoy taile future e chele meye ra keno koshto kore journalism porashona or practice korbe? And with in less than 2/3 years jei proshno gula as a ‚ÄúShangbadik‚Äù kora hobe, jei articles likha hobe, oigular daay bhaar ki half hoileo unar moto ekjon montri er upor pore na? Shangbaadik shobdo ta thik kobe theke kibhaabe ekta gaali te rupantorito hoilo? Or ei decision ki ekjon credible shangbadik er jonno o insulting na? Je kina bochor er por bochor practice kore ei jagay finally ashche? Ekjon sports minister hishaabe member der shathe consult na kore dhaap kore ekta call diye hukum jaari korar moddhe onek boro akarei future predict kora shombhob. And its not a bright one.

üé• Watch Video on Facebook
